title.rendered: Professional Aircraft Accessories Receives DGCA Approval

content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories, a Greenwich AeroGroup company, announced today that it has been approved to perform maintenance on Indonesian registered aircraft.

The approval from the Indonesian Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) grants Professional Aircraft Accessories the ability to perform maintenance services related to landing gear components, accessories, instruments, radio and non-destructive testing.

“We are focused on delivering the best service possible across the global aviation marketplace,” said President of Professional Aircraft Accessories Dave Miller. “This approval demonstrates our well-known repair and overhaul capabilities across a broader international market and our commitment to quality maintenance support worldwide.”

Professional Aircraft has a broad range of domestic and international customer bases that includes aircraft brokers, commercial airlines, corporate flight departments, fractional fleets, independent MROs, Original Equipment Manufacturers, parts distributors, regional airlines, U.S. military and foreign military aircraft fleets.
